verses.verse: Then they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Behold, the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, and they <S%H8154>rob<s%> the <S%H1637>threshingfloors<s%>.

Therefore <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>enquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Shall I <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> these <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>? And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Behold, we be <S%H3373>afraid<s%> here in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: how much more then if we <S%H3212>come<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> against the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>?

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>enquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> yet <S%H3254>again<s%>. And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>; for I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

So <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and brought <S%H5090>away<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>. So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, that he came <S%H3381>down<s%> with an <S%H646>ephod<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5234>delivered<s%> him into mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>; for he is shut <S%H5462>in<s%>, by <S%H935>entering<s%> into a <S%H5892>town<s%> that hath <S%H1817>gates<s%> and <S%H1280>bars<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>called<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>together<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%>, to go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, to <S%H6696>besiege<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> secretly <S%H2790>practised<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%> against him; and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, Bring <S%H5066>hither<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath <S%H8085>certainly<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> for my sake.

Will the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> deliver me <S%H5462>up<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>? will <S%H7586>Saul<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%>, as thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath <S%H8085>heard<s%>? O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, I beseech thee, <S%H5046>tell<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>. And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, He will come <S%H3381>down<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, Will the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> <S%H5462>deliver<s%> me and my <S%H582>men<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>? And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, They will deliver thee <S%H5462>up<s%>. deliver: Heb. shut up

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%>, which were about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376><s%>, <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3318>departed<s%> out of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H834>whithersoever<s%> they could <S%H1980>go<s%>. And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H4422>escaped<s%> from <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>; and he <S%H2308>forbare<s%> to go <S%H3318>forth<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in strong <S%H4679>holds<s%>, and <S%H3427>remained<s%> in a <S%H2022>mountain<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph<s%>. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> him every <S%H3117>day<s%>, but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him not into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> was in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph<s%> in a <S%H2793>wood<s%>.

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> into the <S%H2793>wood<s%>, and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not: for the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> thee; and thou shalt be <S%H4427>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and I shall be <S%H4932>next<s%> unto thee; and that also <S%H7586>Saul<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%>.

And they <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H2793>wood<s%>, and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Then came <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H2130>Ziphites<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Doth not <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> himself with us in strong <S%H4679>holds<s%> in the <S%H2793>wood<s%>, in the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H2444>Hachilah<s%>, which is on the <S%H3225>south<s%> of <S%H3452>Jeshimon<s%>? on: Heb. on the right hand Jeshimon: or, the wilderness

Now therefore, O <S%H4428>king<s%>, come <S%H3381>down<s%> according to all the <S%H185>desire<s%> of thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> to come <S%H3381>down<s%>; and our part shall be to <S%H5462>deliver<s%> him into the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be ye of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for ye have <S%H2550>compassion<s%> on me.

<S%H3212>Go<s%>, I pray you, <S%H3559>prepare<s%> yet, and <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H4725>place<s%> where his <S%H7272>haunt<s%> is, and who hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> him there: for it is <S%H559>told<s%> me that he dealeth <S%H6191>very<s%> <S%H6191>subtilly<s%>. haunt: Heb. foot shall be

<S%H7200>See<s%> therefore, and take <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of all the lurking <S%H4224>places<s%> where he <S%H2244>hideth<s%> himself, and come ye <S%H7725>again<s%> to me with the <S%H3559>certainty<s%>, and I will <S%H1980>go<s%> with you: and it shall come to pass, if he <S%H3426>be<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, that I will <S%H2664>search<s%> him out throughout all the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And they <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H2128>Ziph<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>: but <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> were in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon<s%>, in the <S%H6160>plain<s%> on the <S%H3225>south<s%> of <S%H3452>Jeshimon<s%>.

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> also and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> him. And they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>: wherefore he came <S%H3381>down<s%> into a <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon<s%>. And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that, he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon<s%>. into: or, from the rock

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> on this <S%H6654>side<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> on that <S%H6654>side<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> made <S%H2648>haste<s%> to get <S%H3212>away<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>; for <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5849>compassed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> round <S%H5849>about<s%> to <S%H8610>take<s%> them.

But there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H4116>Haste<s%> thee, and <S%H3212>come<s%>; for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H6584>invaded<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>. invaded: Heb. spread themselves upon, etc

Wherefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: therefore they <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5555>Selahammahlekoth<s%>. Selahammahlekoth: that is, The rock of divisions
And <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from thence, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in strong <S%H4679>holds<s%> at <S%H5872>Engedi<s%>.
